column2: Toggles debug cheat decisions on for all players.
Toggles debug cheat decisions off for all players.
Set §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! as your currently controlled character.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will found a new dynasty, joined by any of [Root.GetHerHis] legitimate descendants.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will instantly gain a smithed artifact of a type to be chosen after taking this decision.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will become the founder of a bloodline to be chosen after taking this decision.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will receive 300 technology points of a type to be chosen after taking this decision.
The lords of the §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§! have their opinion towards §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! increased by §G+25§! §Y(A Most Loyal Vassal)§! for §Y10§! years.

The lords of the §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§! have their opinion towards §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! increased by §G+50§! §Y(Loyal Servant)§! for §Y100§! years. Their AI will accept all diplomatic interactions from §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
Have a child in secret with §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
Increase §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s opinion of me by §G+25§! §Y(Wildly Impressed)§! for §Y10§! years.
Increase §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s opinion of me by §G+50§! §Y(Loyal Servant)§! for §Y100§! years. The AI will accept all diplomatic interactions from me.

Lower the Moral Authority of the §Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]§! faith by §R-10§! §Y([Root.Location.Religion.GetName] Decline)§! for §Y20§! years.
Take an artifact from §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and transfer it to your treasury.
Permanently destroy an artifact belonging to §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will abdicate all of their landed titles to you.

Add a heritable §YWeak Claim§! on the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! to §Y[From.GetBestName]§!.
